title: Looking for reverse engneer online course [duplicate]
content:
This question already has answers here:
                                
                            




Where to find (free) training in reverse engineering? [closed]

                                (6 answers)
                            

Closed 7 years ago.



I looking for online reverse engeneer  course.
Course that study ida,reverse and patch for windows/ linux.
Working with ida and another tool.
I like many videos lesons.
Do you know one?

comments.text: did you tried googling? you're not even giving us what level you're interested in (entry, intermediate, advanced).
Also be aware that those courses most likely will be in highly technical English – beyond your current level.

answers_data.content:
Since you said you like videos, here's a handful of excellent resources off the top of my head:
OpenSecurityTraining's courses: http://opensecuritytraining.info/Training.html
Sam Bowne's CNIT series: https://www.youtube.com/user/sambowne/videos
MalwareAnalysisForHedgehogs (not a course, but extremely valuable, modern videos): https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCVFXrUwuWxNlm6UNZtBLJ-A
OALabs (also not a course, but awesome, modern videos): https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC--DwaiMV-jtO-6EvmKOnqg/videos

comments.text: I looking for recommend on some course you tried
I've watched most videos from all of these resources, which is why I instantly recommended them.

answers_data.content: You can check the Malware Analysis course at - https://github.com/RPISEC/Malware

comments.text: maybe add a word of explanation why this one?
